1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Concrete content type.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Core.Resource.Concrete
6  ( -- * About
7    About (..), AboutJudges,
8
9    -- * Concrete type
10    AboutC, AboutJudgesC, GlobalC,
11    ResourceC, ResultC, ResultWriterC,
12  ) where
13
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                    as B
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax                  as S
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data                    as D
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core.Relmap             as C
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core.Resource.Resource  as C
19
20
21-- --------------------------------------------  About
22
23-- | @about@ clause.
24data About c = About [S.Term c] deriving (Show)
25
26instance (B.MixEncode c) => B.MixEncode (About c) where
27    mixTransEncode sh (About ts) =
28        B.mixString "about" `B.mixSep2` D.termsToMix2 sh ts
29
30-- | Judges with about setting.
31type AboutJudges c = (Maybe (About c), [D.Judge c])
32
33
34-- --------------------------------------------  Concrete type
35
36-- | @About@ for concrete baala content.
37type AboutC = About D.Content
38
39-- | @AboutJudges@ for concrete baala content.
40type AboutJudgesC = AboutJudges D.Content
41
42-- | @Global@ for concrete baala content.
43type GlobalC = C.Global D.Content
44
45-- | @Resource@ for concrete baala content.
46type ResourceC = C.Resource D.Content
47
48-- | @Result@ for concrete baala content.
49type ResultC = C.Result D.Content
50
51-- | @ResultWriter@ for concrete baala content.
52type ResultWriterC = C.ResultWriter D.Content
53
